ygData.subject: Re: New Idea for tinkering
ygData.msgSnippet: If you re talking to the bank teller, you can freely exchange money in your inventory screen to whatever type of coin you want.  I can t imagine it would be
ygData.messageBody:
If you're talking to the bank teller, you can freely exchange money in
your inventory screen to whatever type of coin you want. I can't imagine
it would be all that difficult to say that if PlayerX is holding a
coin-changer then it would run the same subroutine - minus the ability to
interchange items in the bank.

But then again - I have no way of knowing how they have programmed EQ. :)

QdP

"Quasinom de Plume is my quasi-nom-de-plume"


--- Tony Buser <gr0k@...> wrote:
> hehe I love that idea. I've never heard of anyone suggesting that one.
> That would be truely usefull and I can't see how it could imbalance the
> game if it were to be made a charged item. The only problem is I don't
> see how they could possible implement such a thing. All items that have
> a
> special ability are based on magic and there's no magic equivalent to
> this. I could see how this could work as a combine/tradeskill based
> item
> if you could put money in an inventory slot and press combine, but I
> don't
> think you can put money in an inventory slot can you?
